name: Andyhall.github.io
body:
### Andy Hall's Code

I have several [repositories](https://github.com/andyhall?tab=repositories) here on github. Here are a few of them:

* [Awesome Mode](https://github.com/andyhall/generator-awesome) - A plugin for [Photoshop Generator](https://github.com/adobe-photoshop/generator-core) with some goofy features like voice-recognition
* [かっけー モード](https://github.com/andyhall/generator-awesome-ja) - フォトショップ [Generator](https://github.com/adobe-photoshop/generator-core) 用のプラグイン。遊び的な機能をフォトショップに追加する感じです（ボイスコマンドとか）。 (Japanese version of previous)
* [Flash > HTML Demos](https://github.com/andyhall/Flash-HTML-demos) - several demos for converting Flash animations to HTML5, from a talk I gave at CEDEC 2013.

This list may no longer be up to date!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
